item.description:
We will have a frank & open discussion about the group's past & present finances. Julie has all of Joni's membership accounting & spread sheets except for bank records & paper work. She also has all the older records. I've asked Julie to bring her accounting. I've asked Joni to locate her banking records & paper work if possible. I will bring the records that I have. 

We hope that with this transparency our members will understand that the financial amount that was recorded on the site is incorrect at this time.

 

Sincerely, Kiki ;-), Ellen A. & Sandy
item.how_to_find_us: All RSVP's will be given the address.
item.name: Everything You've Wanted to Know About the Group's Finances - an open talk
